reference_summary:
{'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Charles Palmer', 'Andy Wilson', 'John Strickland'], 'Producers': ['ITV'], 'Starring': ['Geraldine McEwan'], 'Studio': ['Agatha Christie']} I have always loved Agatha Christie's Miss Marple. Read the books years ago and finding this series was such a joy. Great to watch and unwind. Makes an enjoyable weekend mini- marathon with friends. Love the books, enjoy the series! {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Edward Hall', 'Peter Medak', 'Tom Shankland', 'Paul Unwin'], 'Producers': ['Rebecca Eaton (WGBH)', 'Phil Clymer (Chorion)', 'Michele Buck', 'Damien Timmer'], 'Starring': ['Geraldine McEwan', 'Anthony Andrews', 'Michael Brandon'], 'Studio': ['Acorn Media']} Love the mysteries with the character Miss Marple. They make me smile. I like the fact they focus on the story and not a lot of blood and gore. Nice evening spent watching an engaging performance by Geraldine McEwan. Spend the evening with a murder mystery Numb3rs Suspense, Drama, Action ['FBI agent Don Eppes recruits his mathematical genius brother Charlie to help the Bureau solve a wide range of challenging crimes in Los Angeles.'] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Dennis Smith', 'Alex Zakrzewski', 'John Behring', 'J. Miller Tobin', 'Stephen Gyllenhaal', 'Ralph Hemecker', 'Julie Hébert', 'Ken Sanzel', 'Rob Morrow', 'Rod Holcomb']} Love the fact I can finally watch all the episodes I missed. I love the family relationship and how the characters interact together.
Smart little brother and the FBI older brother work well as a team to solve cases using math and science. Love this series! Dollhouse Science Fiction, Suspense, Drama, Action ['In the highly anticipated first season of Dollhouse, Echo (Eliza Dushku) is an "Active," a member of a highly illegal and underground group who have had their personalities wiped clean so they can be imprinted with any number of new personas. Confined to a secret facility known as the "Dollhouse," Echo and the other Actives including Sierra and Victor carry out engagements assigned by Adelle, one of the Dollhouse leaders. The engagements cater to the wealthy, powerful and connected, and require the Actives to immerse themselves in all manner of scenarios - romantic, criminal, uplifting, dangerous, comical and the occasional "pro bono" good deed. After each scenario, Echo, always under the watchful eye of her handler Boyd, returns to the mysterious Dollhouse where her thoughts, feelings and experiences are erased by Topher, the Dollhouse\'s genius programmer. Echo enters the next scenario with no memory of before. Or does she?'] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Solomon', 'Joss Whedon', 'Tim Minear', 'Félix Enríquez Alcalá', 'Dwight H. Little', 'David Straiton', 'John Cassaday', 'James A. Contner', 'Steven S. DeKnight', 'Jonathan Frakes']} I was pleasantly surprised to find Dollhouse filled with action and mystery. The overall story line is continues from one episode to another and the twist and turns of the plots keep me coming back to learn more about the dollhouse. Suspenseful and Mysterious. {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Mark Linfield'], 'Producers': ['Vanessa Berlowitz', 'Alastair Fothergill'], 'Starring': ['Sir David Attenborough'], 'Studio': ['BBC America']} Watch as a polar bear goes a-courting. Breath taking scenes, wildlife, what is not to like.
A great watch for exploring sights rarely seen by the lower 48 states. Great for educational
purposes without the dull narrative found in most educational videos. Beautiful scenery {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Larysa Kondracki', 'Ken Girotti', 'Jeff Woolnough', 'Clark Johnson', 'David Hyde', 'Deborah Chow', 'Nathan Morlando', 'T.J. Scott', 'Kari Skogland', 'Clement Virgo'], 'Producers': ['Barry Levinson', 'Tom Fontana', 'Will Rokos', 'Christina Wayne', 'Glen Salzman', 'Sally Catto', 'Brad Van Arragon', 'Vlad Wolynetz'], 'Starring': ['Tom Weston-Jones', 'Franka Potente', 'Kyle Schmid'], 'Studio': ['BBC America']} Mystery about Copper and his wife's death. What did happen? Bits and pieces are revealed as
Copper's character is revealed throughout the season. A bit of mystery {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['---'], 'Producers': ['Seasoned Traveler Productions'], 'Studio': ['TravelVideoStore.com']} I enjoyed this video and would like to travel to Scotland and visit a few of the places mentioned here. I added to my bucket list because of this video. Enjoyable view {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Frank Oz'], 'Producers': ['Gary Foster', 'Lee Rich', 'Bernie Williams'], 'Starring': ['Robert De Niro', 'Edward Norton', 'Marlon Brando'], 'Studio': ['Paramount Pictures']} This movie is very watchable. I am a bit disappointed with the ending but overall the movie was enjoyable and made me wonder how everything would play out. watchable MacGyver Suspense, Drama, Action ["He's everyone's favorite action hero but he's a hero with a difference. Angus MacGyver is a secret agent whose wits are his deadliest weapon."] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English', 'English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Charles Correll', 'William Gereghty', 'Michael Vejar', 'Michael Caffey', 'Cliff Bole', 'Michael Preece', 'James L. Conway', 'Alexander Singer', 'Paul Krasny', 'Chuck Bowman'], 'Producers': ['Henry Winkler', 'Jerrold L. Ludwig'], 'Starring': ['Richard Dean Anderson', 'Dana Elcar', 'Bruce McGill']} Nice storyline great suspense and action. Wholesome entertainment the whole family can enjoy together. Try it I think you will enjoy this show. love seeing this again {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['George Ford'], 'Producers': ['George Ford'], 'Studio': ['Fireplace for your Home']} What more do you need to say, it is beautiful! I love to relax and sip my hot cocoa, and take time for me just watching the snowy scenes pass before me. Love it. Templar Nation Drama, Adventure ["After an archaeologist and his students excavate a Templar Knight's tomb, they are thrown into the middle of an ancient blood feud. They must either follow the Templar's ancient path or face destruction at the hands of a dark league of assassin."] {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Vance'], 'Producers': ['Melissa Hays', 'Joseph James', 'Mark James', 'Rebecca James'], 'Starring': ['Erik Estrada', 'Richard Dutcher', 'Joseph James']} I like the movie. It has a made for TV movie feel and sometimes the story is predictable. But I like a mystery and a bit of adventure so for me it was worth the watch. It will do. {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Dan Bradley'], 'Producers': ['Beau Flynn'], 'Starring': ['Hemsworth', 'Chris (Jed Eckert)', 'Peck', 'Josh (Matt Eckert)', 'Hutcherson', 'Josh (Robert Kitner)']} I like the newer version of this movie. It tells the story well and is full of action.
I think the new and old versions are worth a watch. Interesting remake TURN: Washington's Spies Historical, Drama, Military and War ["AMC's original series TURN: Washington's Spies is the untold story of America's first spy ring. An unlikely team of secret agents form The Culper Ring to help George Washington turn the tide of the Revolutionary War. Only on AMC."] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jeremy Webb', 'Eagle Egilsson', 'Keith Boak', 'Andrew McCarthy', 'Nick Copus', 'Michael Uppendahl', 'Kate Dennis', 'Omar Madha', 'Ed Bianchi', 'S.J. Clarkson'], 'Producers': ['Craig Silverstein', 'Barry Josephson']} this period in time is one of my favorites. The pilot episode is interesting while laying out the characters motives so to speak. Interesting character interactions. A bit of mystery and action as well helps to keep you wondering where things will lead. Revolution? {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Vidura Barrios', 'Jeffrey Main'], 'Producers': ['Vidura Barrios'], 'Studio': ['I Love Christmas']} Beautiful images, with music who could ask for more? Nice addition to enhance the festivities this holiday season. Five Stars
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary**

- **Content Preference**: The user maintains a strong affinity for classic detective stories, particularly those by Agatha Christie, valuing character-driven narratives and intricate plots. Their interests now also embrace action-packed narratives intertwined with historical themes, showcasing an appreciation for drama featuring engaging problem-solving elements. Recently, they have shown a growing enjoyment of visually serene content with festive themes, continuing their appreciation for suspenseful tales centered around family dynamics and teamwork.

- **Viewing Habits**: They enjoy weekend marathons with friends, drawn to rich mysteries and suspenseful action while also seeking calming visuals for relaxation. Their taste balances lighter entertainment with adventure, confirming their love for both comfort and enjoyment.

- **Engagement with Material**: The user favors complex plots and clever storytelling, particularly blends of math and science in problem-solving. Their recent interactions indicate an increasing interest in visually stunning content that enhances seasonal festivities, alongside historical dramas that feature intriguing character dynamics and light mystery.

- **Language & Accessibility**: Prefers English audio and subtitles for clarity.

- **Rating Behavior**: Typically provides high ratings for strong storytelling and emotional resonance. Their latest review reflects an openness to aesthetically pleasing narratives that cultivate communal experiences and celebratory atmospheres, consistent with their tranquil storytelling preferences.
